mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(eventno, title, contents, file1, file1saved, size1, thumb, rdate) VALUES(event_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{size1}, #{thumb}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT eventno, title, contents, file1, file1saved, thumb, size1, rdate FROM event ORDER BY eventno DESC

SELECT eventno, title, contents, file1, file1saved, thumb, size1, rdate FROM event
WHERE
(title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR contents LIKE '%' || #{word}||'%' )
ORDER BY eventno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM event
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR contents LIKE '%' || #{word}||'%' )
